#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int N=12345;
const int INF=(int)2e9;

int f[N], p[N], w[N];

int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int n, full, blank;
        scanf("%d %d", &blank, &full);
        int req=full-blank;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        for(int i=0;i<=req;i++) {
            f[i]=INF;
        }
        f[0]=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
            scanf("%d %d", &p[i], &w[i]);
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
            for(int j=w[i];j<=req;j++) {
                f[j]=min(f[j-w[i]]+p[i], f[j]);
            }
        }
        if(f[req]==INF) {
            puts("This is impossible.");
        } else {
            printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n", f[req]);
        }
    }
}
